TextView.android:text: HOW TO USE IT\n\nSyncflick is very intuitive and simple. You can preview the video you want to dub by clicking on it in a video list. Clicking on video title, description or at least anywhere near the video you would like to dub, will take you to the next activity, where you just press start when you are ready for dubbing. After the video has ended you will be taken to the next activity, where you can review you dubbed video, save it to a gallery or share it on Facebook if you are happy with the dubbing, or you can also redo the dubbing. By clicking back you will get back to the list of videos.
